definition: to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
to guarantee refund or replacement (of faulty or unsatisfactory goods)
to return a product for another item

sentences.english: I would like to refund this blender.
I would like to refund on this blender.
You can come to change one in 7 days if some problem with the quality.
sentences.chinese: 如果有质量问题，您可以在7天内来店退换。

sentences.english: If this shirt doesn’t fit, may I return it later?
sentences.chinese: 如果不合身，我能拿来退换吗？

sentences.english: What should you do if the salesperson refuses to repair or replace it?
sentences.chinese: 如果售货员拒绝修理或退换你应该做什么？

sentences.english: Gifts redeemed are non-returnable and cannot be exchanged for cash.
sentences.chinese: 兑换的礼品不可退货或退换现金。

sentences.english: Once medicines leave the store they may not be returned.

sentences.chinese: 你们的退换货政策是什么？

sentences.english: We accept returns up to seven days after purchase but we do not cover shipping and handling.
sentences.chinese: 可以，七天内都可以退换货，但是运费需要您来承担。

sentences.english: Goods purchased in this store are refundable within seven days.
sentences.chinese: 在本店购买的商品七天内可以退换。

sentences.english: Tickets sold are non-refundable and non-exchangeable.
sentences.chinese: 演出票一经售出，恕不退换。

sentences.english: This is a physiological phenomenon, which is replacing the so-called deciduous teeth.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种生理现象，这就是所谓的乳牙退换。

sentences.english: Handling the complaints, returning and changing the goods, consultation.
sentences.chinese: 处理客户投诉，退换货以及咨询服务。

sentences.english: Thomas exchanged the coat I bought for him. It was too small.
sentences.chinese: 汤玛士把我送他的外套拿去退换，因为尺寸太小了。

sentences.english: Please present the receipt for exchange.
sentences.chinese: 请保存收据，作为退换的凭证。

sentences.english: Return service temporarily set up shop, so please be cautious orders.
sentences.chinese: 本店暂不设置退换货服务，所以请谨慎下单。

definition: to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
to return a product for another item
to guarantee refund or replacement (of faulty or unsatisfactory goods)
to refund/refund
to guarantee refund (for faulty or unsatisfactory goods)
to promise to keep sth in good repair/guarantee/warranty
to refund money
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
cash on delivery (COD)
to dispatch/to send out goods
guarantee period/warranty period
seller
to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to reject/to refuse to accept
to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
inspection of goods
